content.description: This is a fun start, out the small roof, with a powerful, thought-provoking sequence. As with most of the climbs on this wall, the crux is at the beginning. Stiff bouldering leads to some face climbing that finishes easily into the chains.
content.location: Left side of the wall, one right of Orient Blue.

content.description: Stiff bouldering leads to thin slab climbing.
content.location: Middle of the wall, just right of Open Project and left of Apple Crisp.

content.description: As with almost all of the climbs on this wall, the crux is at the beginning. Stiff bouldering leads to some face climbing that finishes easily into the chains.
content.location: Leftmost climb on the wall, shares chains with Stud Muffin (5.11c).

content.description: As with most of the climbs on this wall, the crux is at the beginning. Stiff bouldering leads to some face climbing that finishes at the chains.
content.location: Middle of the wall, right of Curry Powder and left of Open Project.

content.description: I found this to be my favorite climb on the wall, with a seriously heady sequence just before the small roof. Look hard for these holds because there is no chalk out here to help you; they are there. As with most of the climbs on this wall, the crux is at the beginning. Stiff bouldering follows the obvious line up and to the right, exiting the small roof in line with the next bolt. After the third bolt, you sweat it out on minimally protected face climbing that finishes easily into the chains.
content.location: L-R: Orient Blue, Stud Muffin, Curry Powder....

content.description: Starting to the right of the large bush, climb straight up the thin slab. By far, this is the easiest climb on the wall, but I'd just as soon warm up with jumping jacks. That said, it gets much better in the 5.11 range.
content.location: Rightmost climb, to the right of the large bush.

content.description: Start in the bush, literally; there is an easy entrance from the left side. Follow the obvious line up and to the right. Mediocre climbing.
content.location: Right side of the wall, just left of Blueberry Special.
